about.title: About SouqCart
about.subtitle: Your Premier Multi-Vendor E-Commerce Platform
about.ourStoryText: SouqCart was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to create the most trusted and vibrant online marketplace connecting vendors and customers across the region. We believe that commerce has the power to transform lives, empower entrepreneurs, and bring communities together.
about.ourMissionText: To empower vendors of all sizes to reach millions of customers with ease, while providing shoppers a safe, convenient, and delightful shopping experience.
about.ourVisionText: To become the leading multi-vendor e-commerce platform in the Middle East and beyond, driving digital commerce innovation and economic growth.
about.trustedVendorsText: Every vendor on our platform goes through a rigorous verification process to ensure you get genuine products.
about.securePaymentsText: Shop with confidence using our encrypted payment gateway powered by Stripe and cash-on-delivery options.
about.fastDeliveryText: Get your orders delivered quickly with our logistics partners covering the entire region.
about.support247Text: Our dedicated customer support team is always here to help you with any questions or concerns.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At SouqCart, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our platform.
privacy.infoCollectText: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, phone number, shipping address, payment information, and any other information you choose to provide when creating an account, making a purchase, or contacting our customer support.
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to process transactions, send order confirmations, respond to customer service requests, personalize your experience, improve our platform, send marketing communications (with your consent), and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.infoSharingText: We may share your information with vendors to fulfill your orders, payment processors to process transactions, shipping partners for delivery, and as required by law. We never sell your personal information to third parties.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement industry-standard security measures including SSL encryption, secure data storage, and regular security audits to protect your personal information.
privacy.cookiesText: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.yourRightsText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, opt out of marketing communications, and request a copy of your data. Contact us to exercise any of these rights.
privacy.contactUsText: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@souqcart.com.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.intro: Welcome to SouqCart. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
terms.acceptanceText: By registering for an account, browsing, or making a purchase on SouqCart, you agree to these Terms & Conditions, our Privacy Policy, and any additional terms applicable to specific services you use.
terms.accountsText: You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials and for all activities under your account. You must be at least 18 years old to create an account.
terms.vendorTermsText: Vendors must comply with all applicable laws and regulations. Products must be accurately described and genuinely available. SouqCart reserves the right to remove any vendor or product that violates our policies. Commission rates and payment terms are as specified in the vendor agreement.
terms.purchasingText: All purchases are subject to product availability and acceptance of your order. Prices are in USD and include applicable taxes where indicated. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason, including pricing errors.
terms.shippingText: Delivery times are estimates and not guarantees. Risk of loss and title for items pass to you upon delivery. SouqCart is not responsible for delays caused by customs, weather, or other circumstances beyond our control.
terms.returnsText: Items may be returned within 30 days of delivery if they are in their original condition. Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5-10 business days. Some items such as perishables and personalized products are non-returnable.
terms.ipText: All content on SouqCart including logos, text, images, and software is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our express written permission.
terms.limitationText: SouqCart is not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid for the specific transaction giving rise to the claim.
terms.changesText: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We will notify registered users of significant changes via email.
terms.contactUsText: For questions about these Terms, please contact us at legal@souqcart.com.
